1359250.name: VXE
1359250.description:
.VXE is an adrenaline pumping bullet heaven. Explore a decaying cyberspace, as a powerful malware intent on taking revenge against his captors with the help of a mysterious hacker. Customize your weapons with bullet effect sequences, upgrade your core abilities and stack summons to become the ultimate articulation of vengeance - all with the help of the local cats. 

Gameplay

Gameplay is fast and fluid. Sprint, slide and teleport with ease and get rewarded for your mastery of precise movement - or turn yourself into the malware equivalent of a nuclear bomb and forget that you even need to aim. 

Guns aren't the only option. Hack and slash like a ninja, level it up with a shockwave and smack those enemies on the butt with elementals like SHOCK, FIRE and BIT BLEED.

Guns

Every gun is it's own programmable entity, with customizable bullet effect sequences, reload effects, bolt-ons and overclock chips. Min max for incredible builds, or just slap what you have handy together and revel in the novel and surprising effects. 

Upgrades

Core movement, melee, elemental buffs and more can be customized and unlocked for your build, including stunning COMBOs that can scale from simple knockback waves, to full on apocalyptic destruction with effects like RIVERS OF BLOOD or AURA OF VENGEANCE.

Buffs

Look, we get it - you're an ace player and you don't need help. But if you do need help, spend your precious deltas in vending machines to gain access to a variety of temporary buffs when you need that extra oomph to get past the next boss. Hack the system - skip levels on demand with consumable circuits that change the challenge level of the simulation when you're short on time and eager for a challenge.

Story Mode

Progression through story mode unlocks the gateway to SIMULATORs, where you can put all your skills to the test in an escalating series of rogue-lite survivor sandboxes.  Once upon a time, they were your captor's key to you entertained in a cozy corner of cyberspace. Now they may eventually prove to be the backdoor for your ultimate escape.
1359250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
